version_description: Issue fixed where the title screen sometimes offered to start a new campaign rather than continue the last played campaign.

Hard Mode now available! The mutant horde has evolved and gained new deadly abilities, adding new dimensions to the tactical challenge.

Exploration Mode now available! You can now continue playing any concluded campaign in exploration mode.

Other changes:
- Gun Turret skill added for Scientists.
- Flare Shot skill added for Rangers.
- Graphics detail setting added.
- Many tweaks and bug fixes.

Trial mode added where new players can try the first part of the game for free. Players who have previously purchased the game will not be affected by this change and will always have access to the full game!
